description.value:
School transmutation; Level alchemist 4, druid 6, hunter 6, occultist 4, psychic 6, sorcerer/wizard 6, witch 6;

Casting Time 1 standard action
Components V, S

Range personal
Targets you
Duration 24 hours

Description

This spell functions as lesser age resistance, except you ignore the Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution penalties gained at middle age and old age.

data.shortDescription: This spell functions as lesser age resistance, except you ignore the Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution penalties gained at middle age and old age.
